title: Have you forgotten about us? (Wolfstar)
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2tNTyl9

by Cattycat1310

After Sirius returns from Askaban, he knows everything cannot return to normal, but he still hopes a certain werewolf remembers the promises they made. But has Remus Lupin moved on and forgotten about him?

Words: 828, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Sirius Black, Remus Lupin, Nymphadora Tonks, Harry Potter, Marauders (Harry Potter)
  • Relationships: Sirius Black/Remus Lupin
  • Additional Tags: wolfstar, Remus Lupin/Sirius Black - Freeform, Post Askaban, reunited

summary:
Draco: He's  right in hating me. Who would love someone with a Dark Mark?
Pansy: He has a scar in his forehead, that's worst,...
body:
Draco: He's  right in hating me. Who would love someone with a Dark Mark?
Pansy: He has a scar in his forehead, that's worst, and he's ugly
Draco: That's not worst! And don't call my future husband ugly!
Pansy: A second ago he hated you and now he's your husband?
Draco: I don't see the contradiction

dialogue.name: Draco
dialogue.label: Draco:
dialogue.phrase: He's  right in hating me. Who would love someone with a Dark Mark?

dialogue.name: Pansy
dialogue.label: Pansy:
dialogue.phrase: He has a scar in his forehead, that's worst, and he's ugly

dialogue.name: Draco
dialogue.label: Draco:
dialogue.phrase: That's not worst! And don't call my future husband ugly!

dialogue.name: Pansy

dialogue.phrase: A second ago he hated you and now he's your husband?

blog.name: s4ndzy
blog.description: Basically I'm just a little bit mad.

tags: I need this as a prompt man
body:
A thought popped up..

So there I was doodling in another app when a thought struck me, why the bloody hell was Severus Snape’s portrait ok with hearing his own name before a Potter surname?!?!

The man hated James Potter with his every breath, he was bitter towards Harry because of what could’ve been yet I don’t recall a single scene from the cursed child where Harry got dressed down by his portrait. Or better yet a returned from the grave Severus. If it were me I would’ve sent howlers everyday, since Al’s christening, from the grave telling Potter to go f*ck himself somewhere where the sun doesn’t shine with a long stick because how dare he defile his name with the surname Potter!!!

reblog.comment:

And 
oh god
take my heart, lettered, it’s yours yours yours
the eighth...
body:
okay so just read the eighth tale by lettered on ao3

And

oh god

take my heart, lettered, it’s yours yours yours

the eighth tale was utterly heart-wrenching i can’t breathe

so beautiful written

at first i was like feeling awk about the age difference and then i thought it would be better and it just was a different better and now i’m all sad

ughhhhhhhhhhhhw

blog.name: liablu28
blog.title: LiaBlu28
blog.description: Yeah, it's me! My Patronus is a weasel and the house I'm in is Hufflepuff! My Insta is @sparklyblizzardface - follow me!  My interests on Tumblr are generally anything Harry Potter, Yo-Kai Watch, Skyrim (video games in general, really), Bionicle, or Death Note, and also guinea pigs and rabbits, and I ship Wolfstar! I hope you don't hate my blog!

body:
To our lovely ladies

@jenlizrose

@azkabqn

@dontthinkonithermione

@scamandergenes

@honeysuze

@jilylicious

@starrya47

I’ve seen a thread with all you gorgeous ladies on it, and I want to say that you’re all beautiful!

You’re gorgeous and don’t let those anon haters get to you.

Now I’m sure there’s more lovely ladies out here that need love, so if you know any, add their blog, and reblog this post, share the love, show that you gorgeous women don’t need to take that!

You are all beautiful and don’t think otherwise!

We all adore you 💖
